document_data.name: Abjure Undead
document_data.mainbody: '''''Abjure undead''''' was an ability of [[avenger]]s to ''[[channel divinity]]'' of a [[god]] they served.
document_data.Effects: This ability allowed the avenger to fire a ray of [[radiant energy]] that damaged and mesmerized an [[undead]] target, compelling it to stagger forward into melee attack range. This ability greatly increased in power as the avenger gained experience.
document_data.Components: Avengers did not need any [[implement]] or components to use this ability, although it was enhanced with the use of a [[holy symbol]].
